name: ACLManager
description: ACLManager. Access Control List Manager. Main registry of system roles and permissions.

eventDecorators.name: RoleAdminChanged
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when user create request for credit.

eventDecorators.name: RoleGranted
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when user create request for credit.

eventDecorators.name: RoleRevoked
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when user create request for credit.

functionDecorators.name: ADDRESSES_PROVIDER
functionDecorators.description: Returns the contract address of the PoolAddressesProvider.

functionDecorators.name: ASSET_LISTING_ADMIN_ROLE
functionDecorators.description: Returns the identifier of the AssetListingAdmin role.

functionDecorators.name: BRIDGE_ROLE
functionDecorators.description: Returns the identifier of the Bridge role.

functionDecorators.name: EMERGENCY_ADMIN_ROLE
functionDecorators.description: Returns the identifier of the EmergencyAdmin role.

functionDecorators.name: FLASH_BORROWER_ROLE
functionDecorators.description: Returns the identifier of the FlashBorrower role.

functionDecorators.name: POOL_ADMIN_ROLE
functionDecorators.description: Returns the identifier of the PoolAdmin role.

functionDecorators.name: RISK_ADMIN_ROLE
functionDecorators.description: Returns the identifier of the RiskAdmin role.

functionDecorators.name: addAssetListingAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Adds a new admin as AssetListingAdmin.

parameterDecorators.name: admin
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the new admin.

functionDecorators.name: addBridge
functionDecorators.description: Adds a new address as Bridge.

parameterDecorators.name: bridge
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the new Bridge.

functionDecorators.name: addEmergencyAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Adds a new admin as EmergencyAdmin.

parameterDecorators.name: admin
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the new admin.

functionDecorators.name: addFlashBorrower
functionDecorators.description: Adds a new address as FlashBorrower.

parameterDecorators.name: borrower
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the new FlashBorrower.

functionDecorators.name: addPoolAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Adds a new admin as PoolAdmin.

parameterDecorators.name: admin
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the new admin.

functionDecorators.name: addRiskAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Adds a new admin as RiskAdmin.

parameterDecorators.name: admin
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the new admin.

functionDecorators.name: getRoleAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

functionDecorators.name: grantRole
functionDecorators.description: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

functionDecorators.name: hasRole
functionDecorators.description: Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`.

functionDecorators.name: isAssetListingAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the address is AssetListingAdmin, false otherwise.

parameterDecorators.name: admin
parameterDecorators.description: The address to check.

returnDecorators.description: True if the given address is AssetListingAdmin, false otherwise.

functionDecorators.name: isBridge
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the address is Bridge, false otherwise.

parameterDecorators.name: bridge
parameterDecorators.description: The address to check.

returnDecorators.description: True if the given address is Bridge, false otherwise.

functionDecorators.name: isEmergencyAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the address is EmergencyAdmin, false otherwise.

parameterDecorators.name: admin
parameterDecorators.description: The address to check.

returnDecorators.description: True if the given address is EmergencyAdmin, false otherwise.

functionDecorators.name: isFlashBorrower
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the address is FlashBorrower, false otherwise.

parameterDecorators.name: borrower
parameterDecorators.description: The address to check.

returnDecorators.description: True if the given address is FlashBorrower, false otherwise.

functionDecorators.name: isPoolAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the address is PoolAdmin, false otherwise.

parameterDecorators.name: admin
parameterDecorators.description: The address to check.

returnDecorators.description: True if the given address is PoolAdmin, false otherwise.

functionDecorators.name: isRiskAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the address is RiskAdmin, false otherwise.

parameterDecorators.name: admin
parameterDecorators.description: The address to check.

returnDecorators.description: True if the given address is RiskAdmin, false otherwise.

functionDecorators.name: removeAssetListingAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Removes an admin as AssetListingAdmin.

parameterDecorators.name: admin
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the admin to remove.

functionDecorators.name: removeBridge
functionDecorators.description: Removes an address as Bridge.

parameterDecorators.name: bridge
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the bridge to remove.

functionDecorators.name: removeEmergencyAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Removes an admin as EmergencyAdmin.

parameterDecorators.name: admin
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the admin to remove.

functionDecorators.name: removeFlashBorrower
functionDecorators.description: Removes an admin as FlashBorrower.

parameterDecorators.name: borrower
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the FlashBorrower to remove.

functionDecorators.name: removePoolAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Removes an admin as PoolAdmin.

parameterDecorators.name: admin
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the admin to remove.

functionDecorators.name: removeRiskAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Removes an admin as RiskAdmin.

parameterDecorators.name: admin
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the admin to remove.

functionDecorators.name: renounceRole
functionDecorators.description: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`.

functionDecorators.name: revokeRole
functionDecorators.description: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

functionDecorators.name: setRoleAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Set the role as admin of a specific role. By default the admin role for all roles is `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE`.

parameterDecorators.name: role
parameterDecorators.description: The role to be managed by the admin role.

parameterDecorators.name: adminRole
parameterDecorators.description: The admin role.

functionDecorators.name: supportsInterface
functionDecorators.description: See {IERC165-supportsInterface}.
